thread.section_title: Nutrisystem Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nutrisystem | nutrisystem.com
thread.title: Richard Adams

author: Richard Adams
title: Richard Adams
text: I was skeptical about this plan but it has been extremely successful. The pricing is not outrageous and the food is decent. The first week is tough but once that's over it is simple to stay on plan. Definitely use the menu options to avoid foods you don't love. It's a very good plan that is easy to follow. And losing 20 pounds in less than two months is a good testament to its success.
